title: Confessions of an Erotic Masseuse
description: Since the age of eighteen, Alexa Salinger has worked in the sex industry, eventually crossing over to illegal erotic massage. At twenty-five, she finds that, although her work is lucrative, it's keeping her from a healthy relationship with a man, specifically her best friend Cole.In this irreverent memoir, Alexa shares the complexities and perversities of her profession in this "tell-all" memoir.This book contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
author: Alexa Salinger
